effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.

short_effect.sword_shield: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.
